LanguageData.AS_WHE_EngineerTrait.degreeDatas.0.label: Half-Elf Engineer Apprentice
LanguageData.AS_WHE_EngineerTrait.degreeDatas.0.descr: They are interested in the technology of ancient races and are learning to use it to improve their half-elf skills.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_EngineerTrait.degreeDatas.1.label: Half-Elf Engineer
LanguageData.AS_WHE_EngineerTrait.degreeDatas.1.descr: They have knowledge of the technology of ancient races, and are working on improving it by combining it with that of half-elves.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_EngineerTrait.degreeDatas.2.label: Half-Elf Machinist
LanguageData.AS_WHE_EngineerTrait.degreeDatas.2.descr: They have knowledge of the technology of ancient races, and have the technological experience of half-elf technology that makes use of that knowledge.
LanguageData.AS_WeebElf_OdTrait.degreeDatas.0.label: Odo Energy Storage Organ (Small)
LanguageData.AS_WeebElf_OdTrait.degreeDatas.0.descrip: They have a slightly developed organ which takes in the mana energy that exists in the air and converts it into Odo energy, and then stores it inside their body.
LanguageData.AS_WeebElf_OdTrait.degreeDatas.1.label: Odo Energy Storage Organ (Medium)
LanguageData.AS_WeebElf_OdTrait.degreeDatas.1.descrip: They have a well-developed organ that takes in the mana energy present in the air and converts it into Odo energy, and then stores it inside their body.
LanguageData.AS_WeebElf_OdTrait.degreeDatas.2.label: Odo Energy Storage Organ (Large)
LanguageData.AS_WeebElf_OdTrait.degreeDatas.2.descrip: They have a well-developed organ that takes in the mana energy that exists in the air and converts it into energy called Odo, and then stores it inside their body.
LanguageData.AS_WeebElf_OdTrait.degreeDatas.3.label: Odo Energy Storage Organ (Maximum)
LanguageData.AS_WeebElf_OdTrait.degreeDatas.3.descrip: They have an extremely well-developed organ that takes in the mana energy present in the air and converts it into energy called Odo, and then stores it inside their body.
LanguageData.AS_WeebElf_ManaTrait.degreeDatas.0.label: Mana Energy Conversion
LanguageData.AS_WeebElf_ManaTrait.degreeDatas.0.descr: They have an organ within their body that generates and retains the mana energy that exists in the air, making it possible to convert it into Odo energy with high efficiency.
